name: Splinter Soul
description:
Your challenge here is...Survive!!!

You control the player and your soul,  obstacles and enemies can be kill by your soul with "H"it, and left mouse key, you player must move through, left (a) right(d) up(w) and down(s) to collect the souls and jump(space) to don't fall in the darkness

the soul move in the oppsite direction to give you a extra challenge

(if you are left-handed, can use to keyboard arrows)

----

The game will be inside the zipped folder, like an executable called 'SplinterSoul'

how to play: - 

The keyboards A and left arrow: go to the left
 - The keyboards D and right arrow: go to the right 
- The keyboards W and up arrow: go to the up 
- The keyboards S and down arrow: go to the down 
- The keyboards Space jumping 
- The keyboards H left mouse button hit with soul
